snippet: Comcast Corp's NBCUniversal said on Friday it had invested $500 million in Snap Inc as it continues to spend heavily on digital media companies....

headline.main: NBCUniversal Invested $500 Million in Snap Inc as Part of IPO
headline.print_headline: NBCUniversal Invested $500 Million in Snap Inc as Part of IPO

lead_paragraph: Comcast Corp's NBCUniversal said on Friday it had invested $500 million in Snap Inc as it continues to spend heavily on digital media companies.
